mention.text: bogota , 1 oct 89 -- the colombian national liberation army guerrilla movement , which kidnapped spanish businessman pablo martin berrocal almost 2 months ago in quito
a marxist-leninist oriented group that has been involved in armed struggle for 25 years
the eln , a rebel group led by former spanish priest manuel perez

representatives of martin berrocal , who went to bogota in mid-september
